HomePage.title: Ultra-Wide Band eID Vaildation System
HomePage.extra-security-1: Your elD is stored on the Secure Element of your phone.
HomePage.extra-security-2: Ultra-Wide Band technology is used to establish a real-time ranging with tamper-resistant protection.
HomePage.extra-security-3: The "Lost Mode" on your phone immediately protects your identity.
HomePage.low-cost-1: No more cost for a solid identity card.
HomePage.low-cost-2: Say bye to solid card management cost. Distribute and disable elDs on the platform.
